name: Contractus
description: What is the project about? Contractus is a blockchain-based escrow service for secure and encrypted one-click processing of contracts. What makes your project unique? First ever mobile solution for running secure crypto escrow deals using smart contracts. History of your project. Traditional escrow service are often overpriced, complicated, and possess limited infrastructure. As a result, there was a pressing need for a superior method of conducting payments. That is why Contractus was born in 2023 as a Web3.0 service to provide the solution. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Launch of a mobile application for all types of devices: Apple and Android. Implementation of a cross-chain bridge for the flexibility of service delivery. Providing a platform for CTUS tokens trading to ensure the interests of all project participants. What can your token be used for? The core function of CTUS token is to pay fees or reduce it when using the escrow service. Some percentage of the fee received by the service in the form of a CTUS token is burned. This makes the Contractus model deflationary.
